name.ja: エクスキューティー・フラーメ

summoning_condition.en: If your opponent has a face-up Level 6 or higher monster on their field, you can Special Summon this card from your hand face-up to your field.

requirement.en: Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This card gains ATK equal to [the number of face-up Level 6 or higher monsters on the field] x 600 until the end of this turn. This turn, you can only attack with this card.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
